916780.name: Groundless
916780.description:
Play with friends as competing tribes who have the ability to build and destroy ground. Perform a ritual for the Summoning Circle, take control of an Offering, or sacrifice enemies into the Abyss!

Movement is a Double-Edged Sword

Players move and interact with each other through the ground. Building ground creates movement for you, but also for your enemies. Likewise, destroying ground inhibits movement for both you and your enemies.

Building & Destroying Ground

Every player has the ability to build and destroy the ground they walk on. Use your abilities to complete the objective, help teammates, and drop enemies. Then, curve your abilities to catch people off guard or detonate them early for impact!

Play with Friends, or Against Them!

Try out the 3 game modes and new ways to play Groundless: Ritual, Control, and Sacrifice!

  • Ritual (2v2): Teams capture the Summoning Circle and collect offerings to gain points
  • Control (free-for-all): Keep away a single offering from your competitors
  • Sacrifice (free-for-all): Compete against one another with a limited stock of lives
